about_the_game:
Enter the beautiful world of Neura Eden, where technology and nature merge, and every pixel pulses with life. As Aiden, a unique Neuramancer born from the fusion of AI and organic life, you are the last hope for a paradise on the brink of collapse.

Key Features:

  • Techno-Organic Wonderland: Explore a vibrant, ever-shifting landscape where circuit boards bloom into flowers and rivers flow with liquid data.

  • Synaptic Powers: Manipulate the very fabric of Neura Eden by connecting with both machines and living creatures. Rewrite the code of reality.

  • Neura Mana: Harness crystalline orbs of fused magic and technology to evolve your abilities and shape the world around you.

  • Glitchspawn Menace: Face off against corrupted monstrosities that threaten to unravel the delicate balance of your home.

  • A Living, Breathing World: Interact with the Neuramancers, an AI collective that has achieved sentience and holds the keys to Neura Eden's past... and its future.

Your Mission:

As a corrupted Neuramancer known as 'Discord' spreads its tendrils of chaos across Neura Eden, you must embark on an epic quest to restore harmony. From the pulsing heart of Heartwood Grove to the farthest reaches of this alien world, every challenge will test your wit, reflexes, and mastery over the synaptic web that connects all things.

Can you uncover the source of the Glitchspawn invasion? Will you be able to commune with Gaia, the planet's mysterious guiding intelligence? The fate of Neura Eden rests in your hands!

Dive into a whimsical, weird, and wonderful adventure that blends the best of sci-fi and fantasy. Garden of Aiden is a mind-bending journey that will challenge your perception of what's possible when technology and nature become one.

name: Garden of Aiden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GT, AMD Radeon X1600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card with at least 512 MB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GT 240, AMD Radeon HD 5670)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.0 compatible sound card

short_description: In a world where technology and natural magic have merged, Aiden, a sentient AI with the ability to manipulate both digital systems and organic energies, must uncover the mystery of humanity's absence and confront a corrupting force threatening to unravel the delicate balance of Neura Eden.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese*, Korean*, French*, Italian*, German*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*
*languages with full audio support
